subject: TestSetup and the Test Hierarchy
msgSnippet: Is there any way to use the TestSetup decorator and still see each individual test in the Test Hierarchy tab in the swingui window? This thread came up
messageBody:
Is there any way to use the TestSetup decorator and still see each
individual test in the "Test Hierarchy" tab in the swingui window?
This thread came up before, but I couldn't find any conclusion. Any
ideas?
